title: A.D. Esposende
text:
Associação Desportiva de Esposende "(abbreviated as AD Esposende)" is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Esposende">Esposende</a> in the <a href="district%20of%20Braga">district of Braga</a>.
Background.
AD Esposende currently plays in the <a href="Terceira%20Divis%C3%A3o">Terceira Divisão</a> Série A which is the fourth tier of <a href="Portuguese%20football%20league%20system">Portuguese football</a>. The club was founded in 1978 and they play their home matches at the Estádio Padre Sá Pereira in <a href="Esposende">Esposende</a>. The stadium is able to accommodate 5,000 spectators.
The club is affiliated to <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20de%20Futebol%20de%20Braga">Associação de Futebol de Braga</a> and has competed in the AF Braga Taça. The club has also entered the national cup competition known as <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">Taça de Portugal</a> on occasions, and reached the semifinals in <a href="1998%E2%80%9399%20Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal">1999</a>.
